resources.string: Spider-Man is a cool superhero who will save the world from supervillains. Watch how the hero became who he is now.

The Hulk is just a radiation healthy man who wants to save the world from evil uncles. He seeks to destroy everything in the way, sometimes not realizing how much evil he is doing. Do not drink low-quality alcohol - the main message of the film, as you can become like the Hulk.
SA bat is not just an animal. Batman is a hero who does not sleep at night. Fearless dark knight strolling through the streets of New York in order to find someone and beat.
